Title: Relates to prohibiting the use of gas-powered leaf and lawn blowers during certain months
Summary: Prohibits the use of gas-powered leaf and lawn blowers between May 1st and September 30th.
LawCode: Add ยง1300-d, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prohibiting the use of gas-powered leaf and lawn blowers during certain months
